Class FireDragonNode

java.lang.Object
com.platformer.escape_beyond.model.entity.node.movable.MovableNode
com.platformer.escape_beyond.model.entity.node.movable.enemy.EnemyNode
com.platformer.escape_beyond.model.entity.node.movable.enemy.FireDragonNode
public class FireDragonNode extends EnemyNode
Represents a fire dragon enemy in the game.

The fire dragon is a type of enemy that moves within a specified range in a straight line. This class extends the EnemyNode class and uses the LineMove strategy to define its movement behavior.

  • Constructor Details

    • FireDragonNode

      public FireDragonNode(String enemyType, javafx.scene.Node node, int[] range)
      Constructs a new FireDragonNode with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      enemyType - The type of the enemy, typically used to identify the fire dragon.
      node - The Node object representing the graphical or logical representation of this fire dragon in the game world.
      range - An array of two integers specifying the movement range of the fire dragon. The first value represents the minimum range, and the second value represents the maximum range.
